message.body: Hey Julia! I was wondering if I could meet you somewhere this week to grab my bathing suite. If not I can stop by on Friday on our way to VT.
Yes!! I'll be in the city tues/wed/thurs & home in Friday. What works for you? My office is at 6/race but I can walk to meet you too.
I think meeting you at your house on Friday would work best! Probably around 10ish in the am. Does that work?
Yup, I'm working from home so I'll be around. Let me know if you need the address/directions/anything!
Lol! I'll definitely save some room for ya in my suite case!
Fair warning, I might try to stow away and go to Vermont too!
